password.title: Your password must contain at least:

alerts.invalidVerificationCodeProvidedPleaseTry: Invalid verification code provided, please try again.
alerts.attemptLimitExceededPleaseTryAfterSomeTi: Attempt limit exceeded, please try later.

register.title: Set up an account
register.description: Fill in the information bellow to receive an activation link in your email

terms.text: I have read, understood and agree to the

register.promotion: Please send me promotional emails about QuantConnect and Quant Services

pageActivation.title: An activation link is on its way!
pageActivation.description: Please check {0} and click on the activation link to finalise the account set-up. The activation link is valid for the next 24 hours. Make sure to check the Spam folder as well.

pageActivated.title: Account activated
pageActivated.description: Your account has been activated. You can now access Quant Connect by logging in.

pageAlreadyActivated.title: Link already activated
pageAlreadyActivated.description: This link has already been activated. To access Quant products, please login to your account.

pageExpired.title: Link expired
pageExpired.description: The link you are trying to use has expired. If you need a new one, use the resend button.

resetPasswordConfirmation.title: Password updated succesfully
resetPasswordConfirmation.description: Your password has been changed succesfully. You can now access Quant Connect by logging in with your new credentials.

validation.format: Please enter a valid email address e.g. example@example.com
validation.short: Your password must be a minimum of {0} letters
validation.match: Please make sure your passwords match
validation.mustSomeDigits: Please enter your {0} digit activation code

form.title: Reset your password
form.description: Fear not. We'll email you instructions to reset your password.

reset.title: Create new password
reset.description: An activation code has been sent to {0} Please make sure you check your spam folder as well. The code is valid for 24 hours.

sent.title: Email has been sent
sent.description: Introduction on how to reset your password have been sent to your inbox. Please make sure you check your spam folder as well.

alert.active: These are users that have an active account.
alert.pending: These are users that didn't activate their account yet. Pending users are automatically removed after 90 days.
alert.removed: These are users that have been removed from the active users list of Quant Connect, or pending requests that expired.

active.title: No active users yet
active.text: This list will be populated as users activate their account. You can start by adding a Quant Connect Admin.

pending.title: No pending users
pending.text: This list of users will show those who have an account created, but who have not yet activated it via their email link.

removed.title: No removed users
removed.text: Any removed users will appear here.

alert.title: Important:
alert.text: You will need to make sure that your First name and Last name registered on your profile exactly matches the First name and the Last name on your chosen identity document. Your identity check will fail if the First name and Last name don’t corespond to your ID.

verification.beforeStart: Before we start, please make sure you have the following in hand:
verification.mobileDevice: A mobile-device capable of taking photos
